1.content: Before anything, let us find out who you are as a person.
1.title: Introductions

11.content:
(Note: If you don’t like my character and wanted to create your own, feel free to hit the other option buttons down below. However, if you like my character and would like to continue with this, please hit the first option button, or ‘Continue’ at the bottom of the page. Thanks!)

We meet Lewis, who is 10 years of age, and stood at about 4’2” inches. He also had brown hair, and has got Caucasian skin, like the rest of the family. Along with him and his Dad, Thaddeus, his mother named Cathy, is a model/actress, and gets admired by people that adored her success, both in pictures and on film. He has got a sister named Karen, who is twelve, and is part of the swimming team, competing in number of events for medals.

While both Cathy and Karen had got nothing to do with this scientific technology, Lewis himself was admired by Thaddeus’ work, since he was only seven. He eventually got so excited, that every time he tried on one subject to make things bigger and larger, would constantly fail time and time again. The youngster may be sad by this, but he would be determined to make this failed project into his ambitious plan.

That’s when it would take years later to be able to work on his Dad’s project, but only when he’s alone, since his father had prohibited anyone going to the Lab unattended. But Lewis would do this against his wishes and tries to see if these inventions can make it work, something which his father had failed to do some years before.
11.title: Male 10-12

111.content:
It was the start of the weekend, where Lewis can be seen eating some breakfast to start off his day. He was a bit eager to get to the Lab, which is only the two places his Dad works, both at home and in the Laboratory building. Although he wouldn’t be able to go in the main building, he does go in the basement, which is the other Lab is stationed, but only when he’s alone, since his Dad wouldn’t allow his son to get in when he’s here.

Lewis may be patient as such, but his heart was beating so much, his mind always made him think about the invention that gone so wrong from the past, and he feels he can be the one to fix this problem. Luckily, this is gonna be a busy weekend, when he can hear his Dad’s voice, knowing that he’s going away just now, much to a delight from Lewis at this moment.

“Okay Lewis, that’s me away! Try and not entering my Lab while I’m gone, would you?” Thaddeus asked as he was at the front door.

“Don’t worry Dad, I won’t do anything near your stuff.” Lewis lied as if his Dad was gonna trust him with that wish.

“Alright, I’ll see you when I’m back home!” Thaddeus response with a smile before shutting the door and heads over to the Lab building.

When Lewis heard the car set off, he grinned knowing his plan worked like a charm, and it was time to head over to fix this failed invention. It’s inside the basement downstairs, and Lewis made no hesitation but to go through the door and entered the Lab to look for an item he’s working on.

“Now where is that invention? Oh, there it is!” Lewis says happily as he had found his invention he was after, which is actually a...
111.title: When Dad’s away, Lewis goes in!

choices: ...was starting to get a little bit bigger!
...felt nothing, as the effects died down quickly.
1111.content:
This is what Lewis’ Dad has been working on for the past couple of years. It was some lotion of liquid that had many glasses with a heater underneath the bigger glass. It was bubbling up nicely, which he knew it would take a while to settle.

“Hmm... I think this comes up nicely indeed.” Lewis says with some confident look to his face.

He’ll be glad that it was the final stage of the experiment, and so once it came at the right temperature, Lewis switches the heater off, before he uses his gloves to start pour into a small glass. He would stir it in to give it good mix, and for a moment on, his Dad’s work is complete.

“Finally, I’ve able to finish it all off! Now all I need to know if this stuffs really work?” Lewis may be delighted it’s over, but he still have to wonder what this stuff does.

Only his Dad would know what was the purpose and what it was used for. Lewis was beginning to be curious, and thought of an idea of letting his Dad know about the experiment he managed to finish it off. But then again, he could end up getting into trouble, since he was told not to go to his Dad’s Lab by any means.

It would take a while to come up with other ideas, but the only choice to test things out, if he could drink it and see what happens. It may be a great risk to take, but he feels he may not be able to see the finished experiment again, so he knew he needed to find out for himself. Lewis grabbed a glass full of lotion liquid, and takes a huge sigh by saying as much as he was very nervous from this.

“Okay, here goes nothing!” Lewis says and drinks the whole glass and swallowed it all.

He would then wait for a moment, which sometimes it takes a while to take some effect to happen. Lewis was about to move away from the Lab quickly, when he felt something strange inside of him, and clutched his stomach as if he lotion liquid had started to take effect. It only took a couple of seconds until Lewis...
1111.title: Lotion of liquid

12.content:
(Adder Note: There will be four other choices if you don't like my character or if you just want to make your own path. If you like my character, then just hit continue as I layout her story below)


We meet Mei, she's only 10-years old and stands roughly at 4'1" and has light tanned oriental skin. Her Mother being original from an Asian territory and her Father hailing from Hawaii. Her parents met at a airport and the rest was history. They moved to America 11-years ago. Where her father worked continued his work as a scientist. You see he's been working on some inventions that can cause things to be enlarged. Thaddeus was inspired to create such a thing while he was living in Hawaii. As he seen people around the world hungry. The droughts America had faced so many times, how Africa just didn't have enough food to go around and just how harsh our environment is to our crops and farm lands.

However, the years he's spent on this has been... less than remotely successful. Either the food doesn't grow at all or just simply overloads and explodes! Making quite a mess to say the least. Mei has watched her father work on this invention ever since she could walk. And she really wanted to help her father succeed, but he appreciated her offer to help out, but kindly explained to her that this was a complex device and she would only hinder the process.

Though one day. Mei decided she would go against her dad's wishes and try to see if she could get the device to work properly or not. One could only guess what was going to occur on that warm Spring day where everything was freshly blooming and growing...
12.title: Meet Mei?

14.content:
(Author's note: Options are not limited to this character so those who want a different character instead can choose another choice if they wish.)

This is Helena, a 6'2" 15 year old girl of Swedish descent from her mother, Ivanika. Thaddeus met her at an European Inventor's convention, they shared the same passion of trying to help increase food and quite possibly livestock resources by enlarging safely and effectively. One thing led to someone's hotel room, then the two settled down, had two children; Helena and her sister Vonnah, who is 12; and decided to continue to pursuit their efforts at a research facility a few miles from home.

Helena is the tallest of her family, Thaddeus at 5'11", Ivanika at 5'7", and Vonnah at 5'3". She also loves flaunting and using her size to get her way. Her parents being quite successful and often very involved in their work, she kinda developed a brat like personality so she often gets what she wants. Now that a recent spurt of puberty hit her, Helena shot up and quite a bit out, since she also developed into DD cup and a very bubbly behind. She interestingly enough does not like being, well, so big. In fact, she would dread being even taller than she is now.
As much as she doesn't quite understand how all their experiments in the basement lab worked; she truly does want her mother and father to succeed in their careers and would like to help in some way but couldn't think of how.
14.title: Female 13-16

choices: The lotion or the green liquid
The remote or the big ray gun
141.content:
One bright and early Sunday morning, about 10:30am, Helena was laying on her bed, browsing on her phone, completely bored. She then heard a couple of knocks on her door, "Yeah?" Helena answered without looking away from the screen. "Hey sweetie, it's dad. Your mother and I need to run to work for the day, one of the researchers wasn't able to come in so we are going in to catch up. We'll be back in time for dinner so please watch your sister and the house, okay?" Helena puts her phone down, sighs quietly, and sits upright, "Got it. Have fun guys." Her dad responds, "Thank you, you as well!" She hears footsteps leaving the front of her door, then going down the stairs. "Ready dear?" her mom said, "Just about!" Helena heard the front door open then close, no other sound afterwards. "Ughh, now I'm get to be bored and watch Vonnah too, freaking great!" she said with a sarcastic tone. She stood up and walked to her door when a strange thought entered her mind. "Wait," Helena thought, "I think Vonnah is still sleeping in and since Mom and Dad are gone, maybe it's time to check out the basement for once"
Helena has always been curious of what they been working on at home but either they were working down there or they kept it locked. It's not like she wasn't interested in their work, it's more like she wants to do things her own way, without showing she does. She opens her door stealthily, trying not to cause her sister to wake up, and walks to the stairs. Being a very tall, stacked teenager, she can only be so quiet going down the staircase. Luckily, she made it down without any incident and went toward the basement door. She reaches for the handle, "Watch as it's locked anyways," but the door opened, much to Helena's suprise. She then thought, "Well, they did kinda leave in a hurry so maybe they forgot. Might as well check it out."
She proceeds to go into the basement, finding that it was actually quite spacious with lots of beakers of different sizes, various gadgets and the such on long tables. On one side of the room was a large device as big as a refrigerator, it looked like a big ray gun like something from a scfi movie. She walked closer to the tables to inspect what was there; there was a unmarked bottle of what appears to be lotion, a glass flask of bright green liquid with a slight fruity aroma, and a tv remote with a few buttons and knobs. Helena was thinking of checking out the lotion and the flask, the remote crossed her mind as well as the device across the room.
What shall she take a look at first?
141.title: A start of a tall tale

15.content:
This is for those who do not like the first line of options.
Here is choices so everyone could create something new for themselves or others.
15.title: Other, in case of emergency

info.brief_description: Many failed experiments, will you find one to make you bigger?
info.description:
Thaddeus Higgins is a brilliant scientist who was working on ways to make things larger, such as food, resources, etc., but all of them failed terribly; except one! Wanting your dad to succeed in his field, you decided to use one of the many inventions to see if it works. The problem is, are you prepared for what's to come?

You can make your own character to experience this story, so creativity is pretty much free rein, but here are some rulings:
-Try to have longer segments, like 5 or more sentences, so it reads like a story
-Really describe the growing process, like the sensations, thoughts, and reactions
-Lastly, just no toilet play, like scat and piss
Other than that, have fun, write well and often!
